alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Borden; Dawson; Gaines; Howard; Martin; Mitchell; Scurry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 29 at 4:53PM CDT until August 29 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: CCA The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northeastern Andrews County in western Texas... Southern Scurry County in western Texas... Mitchell County in western Texas... Eastern Gaines County in western Texas... Southwestern Borden County in western Texas... Howard County in western Texas... Martin County in western Texas... Dawson County in western Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 448 PM CDT, blowing dust extended from Lamesa to Big Spring, to Westbrook moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility at times with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 151 and 228. Locations impacted include... Big Spring, Lamesa, Colorado City, Ackerly, Stanton, Coahoma, Loraine, Forsan, Sand Springs, Lomax, Lenorah, Lake Colorado City, Lake Colorado City State Park, Inadale, Welch, Luther, Colorado City Airport, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Champion Creek Reservoir and Westbrook. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

area.areaDesc: Andrews; Borden; Dawson; Gaines; Howard; Martin; Mitchell; Scurry
